items.value: People from (%@city%) of (%@kingdom%) have been infected by a new disease called (%plague%).
(%@king%) orders all aid to be directed at the afflicted families.
(%@king%) begins a research to develop a bioweapon.
(%plague%) spreads to (%@city%) of (%@kingdom%). (%@king%) orders all aid to be directed at the afflicted families.
(%plague%) spreads to (%@city%) of (%@kingdom%). (%@king%) quarantines affected families.
(%plague%) spreads to (%@city%) of (%@kingdom%). (%@king%) begins a research to develop a bioweapon.
(%@king%) sent (%@exterminator%) to cleanse a plague-ridden settlement.
(%@king%) sent (%@healer%) to cure a plague-ridden settlement.
A vaccine has been developed for (%plague%). Curing the plague will be much faster now.
(%@kingdom%) develops a new bioweapon based on (%plague%).
Introduce a virulent plague. You may select which Kingdom it will start on.
